name: jobboard-default-theme
description: Jobboard Default Theme for customer-facing site.

scripts.setup: mkdir -p public/js && cp vendor/*.js public/js && cp -r src/assets/* public/
scripts.tw:onchange: npm run setup && onchange 'vendor/**/*.js' 'tailwind.config.js' 'src/**/*.css' 'templates/**/*.html' -- npm run tw:build
